description: Alterations to existing rear roof extension and installation of two rooflights, extension over part rear outrigger
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings titled:

Application form; Site Location Plan (Drawing number: 1503_PL_001); Proposed First Floor Plan (Drawing number: 1503_PL_007); Existing East Elevations (Drawing number: 1503_PL_005); Existing First Floor Plan (Drawing number: 1503_PL_002); Proposed Loft Level Plan (Drawing number: 1503_PL_008); Existing Roof Plan (Drawing number: 1503_PL_004); Design and Access Statement (Drawing number: 1503_PL_012); Existing South Elevation (Drawing number: 1503_PL_006); Existing Loft Level Plan (Drawing number: 1503_PL_003); Proposed East Elevation (Drawing number: 1503_PL_010); Proposed Roof Plan (Drawing number: 1503_PL_009); Proposed South Elevation (Drawing number: 1503_PL_011); Examples of similar roof extensions (Drawing number: 1503_PL_014); Images of existing property (Drawing number: 1503_PL_013);

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), polices D1, and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment, revision or new Order) no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason:  To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| The windows  inserted in the side elevation of the outrigger roof extension shall be obscure glazed and non-opening (where openable parts less than 1.7m above floor) unless otherwise confirmed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
Reason: To safeguard neighbouring amenity from light pollution in accordance with policy 7A of Ealing's Development Management DPD.
| The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
